cards.title: Heart Attack / Chest Pain
steps: Make the person sit down and rest

cards.title: Severe Bleeding
steps: Apply direct pressure with a clean cloth
Do not remove blood-soaked bandages; add more on top

cards.title: Burn Injury
steps: Run cool (not cold) water over the burn for 20 mins

cards.title: Snake Bite / Poisoning
steps: Keep the person still and calm
Do not cut or suck the wound
Note the appearance of the snake if possible

cards.title: Pregnancy / Labor
steps: Keep the mother comfortable and lying on her left side
